page.title: 14Sarn Motorsports Club
page.content: In 1968 a few lads got together with the idea of forming a Motorsports club.They started raising money by having dances and when they had enough money to find the prize money, a meeting was called, and soon Sarn Motorsports Club was born.This was in 1969.By now they had Â£150 in the bank before they ran their first event,a {grass-track.}The meeting was held at{ {Mellington Hall}on ground owned by Mr Jack Evans.It was run on a Saturday afternoon.This was a big success.After that,they ran one more in May and one in September.After a few years they soon added a{scramble}to their list of events held at{Pant Farm,}Sarn.Then on to trails after that ,both with great success.This went on for many years, until one Sunday an accident between two sidecars caused the death of one member of Sarn Motorsports Club.
